import { createSignal } from "solid-js" import { cookieStorage, makePersisted } from "@solid-primitives/storage" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" import { Resizable, ResizableHandle, ResizablePanel } from "@/components/ui/resizable" import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator" import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "@/components/ui/tabs" import { TextField, TextFieldInput } from "@/components/ui/text-field" import { IconArchive, IconFile, IconInbox, IconMessages, IconSend, IconShoppingCart, IconTrash, IconUpdates, IconUsers } from "@/components/icons" import { AccountSwitcher } from "@/components/mail/account-switcher" import { MailDisplay } from "@/components/mail/mail-display" import { MailList } from "@/components/mail/mail-list" import { Nav } from "@/components/mail/nav" export function Mail() { const [sizes, setSizes] = makePersisted(createSignal([]), { name: "resizable-sizes", storage: cookieStorage, storageOptions: { path: "/" } }) const [isCollapsed, setIsCollapsed] = createSignal(false) return ( { setIsCollapsed(e === 0), console.log("collapse", e) }} onExpand={() => { setIsCollapsed(false), console.log("expand") }} class={cn(isCollapsed() && "min-w-[50px] transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out")} >

Inbox

All mail Unread
) }

import { createMemo, Show } from "solid-js" import { Avatar, AvatarFallback, AvatarImage } from "@/components/ui/avatar" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu" import { Separator } from "@/components/ui/separator" import { Switch, SwitchControl, SwitchLabel, SwitchThumb } from "@/components/ui/switch" import { TextField, TextFieldTextArea } from "@/components/ui/text-field" import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipTrigger } from "@/components/ui/tooltip" import { IconArchive, IconClock, IconDotsVertical, IconForward, IconReply, IconReplyAll, IconTrash } from "@/components/icons" import { mails } from "@/components/mail/data" import { mail } from "@/components/mail/use-mail" export function MailDisplay() { const data = createMemo(() => mails.find((item) => item.id === mail.selected) ?? null) return (
Archive Archive Move to trash Move to trash Snooze Snooze
Reply Reply Reply all Reply all Forward Forward
More Mark as unread Star thread Add label Mute thread
No message selected
} >
{data()! .name.split(" ") .map((chunk) => chunk[0]) .join("")}
{data()!.name}
{data()!.subject}
Reply-To: {data()!.email}
{data()!.date && (
{new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-US", { dateStyle: "medium", timeStyle: "short" }).format(new Date(data()!.date))}
)}
{data()!.text}
Mute this thread
) }
